projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A sleek and responsive portfolio website built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion to showcase my work and skills.

projects.title: Event Promotion Website
projects.description: A futuristic Fallout 3 terminal-style event website designed for Crescita 2k25, featuring a retro UI and immersive experience.

projects.title: FiveM HUD for Qbox
projects.description: A custom HUD interface for FiveM, revamped from qbx-hud to improve user experience and visuals for roleplay servers.

projects.title: ThinkForge – Study Planner Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot that helps students plan their study schedules effectively. Built for KEC Hackathon 2k25, and winner of Hackbuzz.
